install.name: S5 News Ticker
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description: This module will display one line of text in a fading transition.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: tween_time
param.label: Tween Time (in seconds)
param.description: The amount of time in seconds an text line takes to fade.

param.name: display_time
param.label: Display Time (in seconds)
param.description: How many seconds will each text line display for?

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: Enter the height of the text fader.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Enter the width of the text fader.

param.default: You may enter up to 10 lines of text with HTML code included. If you do not wish to use 10 simply leave the extra fields blank. IMPORTANT - Do not leave fields blank between text lines, ie: If you are only using 4 text lines then fields for text lines 1,2,3,4 should be filled in, not text lines 1,3,5,6 or any other order like it.
param.label: Note:

param.name: text1line
param.label: Text Line 1 (leave blank if none)
param.description: Enter the text of line 1, leave blank if none.
